mapper.select: SELECT dp.id AS dataPsiId, dp.result_name AS resultName, dpt.id as taskId, dpt.task_id as taskIdName, dt.task_start_time as taskStart, dt.task_end_time as taskEnd, dpt.task_state as taskState, dpt.ascription as ascription, dpt.create_date as createDate FROM data_psi dp, data_psi_task dpt, data_task dt WHERE dp.id = dpt.psi_id and dpt.task_id = dt.task_id_name and dp.result_name like CONCAT('%',#{resultName},'%') ORDER BY dp.id desc LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(dp.id) FROM data_psi dp, data_psi_task dpt WHERE dp.id = dpt.psi_id and dp.result_name like CONCAT('%',#{resultName},'%')

SELECT dp.id as dataPsiId, dp.result_name as resultName, dpt.create_date as createDate, dpt.update_date as updateDate, dpt.file_rows as fileRows, dpt.id as taskId, dpt.task_id as taskIdName FROM data_psi dp, data_psi_task dpt WHERE dp.id = dpt.psi_id and dp.result_name like CONCAT('%',#{resultName},'%') ORDER BY dp.id desc LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(dp.id) FROM data_psi dp, data_psi_task dpt WHERE dp.id = dpt.psi_id and dp.result_name like CONCAT('%',#{resultName},'%')

SELECT id,psi_id as psiId,task_id as taskId,task_state as taskState,ascription,ascription_type as ascriptionType,file_path filePath,file_content fileContent,create_date FROM data_psi_task WHERE id = #{id}

select id,own_organ_id as ownOrganId,own_resource_id as ownResourceId,own_keyword as ownKeyword, other_organ_id as otherOrganId,other_resource_id as otherResourceId,other_keyword as otherKeyword, output_file_path_type as outputFilePathType,output_no_repeat as outputNoRepeat,tag as tag, result_name as resultName,output_content as outputContent,output_format as outputFormat,result_organ_ids as resultOrganIds, remarks,user_id as userId,create_date as createDate from data_psi where id = #{id}
